item.description:
Since the Pats are not playing, I thought it would be fun to watch the team that beat the NY Jets. Especially since Pennington, who played 8 years with the Jets was cut like a hot potato right before the 2008 season started for Favre. Favre who came out of retirement after playing with Greenbay since 1992. Talk about jilted fans...

So come on down to McFadden's that great fun place we've been trying to get to all season!


Donation of $1.00 to organizer at beginning of event greatly appreciated to help cover Meet Up web costs.
item.name: AFC Wild Card Game Baltimore vs. Miami
